title: Factor of Safety Calculator | Mechanical Engineering Tool

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: FoS = Strength / AppliedStress MS = FoS - 1 σ_allow = Strength / FoS_target σ = F / A Select strength as Sy (yield) for ductile design or Su (ultimate) for brittle/fracture-limited design.
